mapper.select: SELECT c.id AS id, c.capital AS capital, c.company_type AS companyType, c.credit_union_code AS creditUnionCode, c.email AS email, c.info AS info, c.officer_net AS officerNet, c.organization_code AS organizationCode, c.phone AS phone, c.registration AS registration, c.registration_number AS registrationNumber, c.site AS site, c.STATUS AS STATUS FROM t_cooperatives c GROUP BY c.id LIMIT #{start},#{rows}
